> 
> If I just answer *Yes* will you accept that? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

how very Kerbal of you!

Yanfret, I thought I would suggest switching the IVA in the bobcat capsule to the newly released MK 1-2 IVA from alexustas. As it is currently the IVA from the ALCOR pod. Might make it a little more streamlined / varied from the monkey rover

[http://kerbalstuff.com/mod/1022/%27MK1-2%20%20Pod%27%20IVA%20Replacement%20by%20ASET](http://kerbalstuff.com/mod/1022/%27MK1-2%20%20Pod%27%20IVA%20Replacement%20by%20ASET)

Besides that, Thanks for all your hard work. It looks great!

> 
> Yanfret, I thought I would suggest switching the IVA in the bobcat capsule to the newly released MK 1-2 IVA from alexustas. As it is currently the IVA from the ALCOR pod. Might make it a little more streamlined / varied from the monkey rover
> [http://kerbalstuff.com/mod/1022/%27MK1-2%20%20Pod%27%20IVA%20Replacement%20by%20ASET](http://kerbalstuff.com/mod/1022/%27MK1-2%20%20Pod%27%20IVA%20Replacement%20by%20ASET)
> 
> 
> 
> Besides that, Thanks for all your hard work. It looks great!

Yes please! I think it would look much better, make more sense, and fit the same role the ALCOR with all the same monitor displays and buttons

Here is a patch that should work to add the ( 'MK1-2 Pod' IVA Replacement by ASET ) to the CMES OrionPod's 

Needed KSP 1.04

 RasterPropMonitor plugin 0.21.2 - [https://github.com/Mihara/RasterPropMonitor/releases](https://github.com/Mihara/RasterPropMonitor/releases)

 ASET Props 1.3 - [https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/1021/ASET%20Props](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/1021/ASET%20Props)

And put this patch anywhere in KSP/GameData/ [https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/CMES/XOrionPodX_CMES_Patch.cfg.zip](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/CMES/XOrionPodX_CMES_Patch.cfg.zip)

And be nice if you goto each of the modders thread and hit the litttle start under the modders name and give them some Rep let them know you love there work ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

EDIT-

And whoops missed one download also need to have 'MK1-2 Pod' IVA Replacement by ASET installed 

 MK1-2 Pod' IVA Replacement by ASET - [https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/1022/%27MK1-2%20%20Pod%27%20IVA%20Replacement%20by%20ASET](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/1022/%27MK1-2%20%20Pod%27%20IVA%20Replacement%20by%20ASET)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-22T19:59:06Z" title="07/22/2015 07:59  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 22, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**
Yes indeed version 1.0.4 A will be ready this evening, it will include that and also the brand new ALCOR MONKEY INTERNALS which Alex Ustas sent over to us this morning!

> 
> Yes indeed version 1.0.4 A will be ready this evening, it will include that and also the brand new ALCOR MONKEY INTERNALS which Alex Ustas sent over to us this morning!

What could these brand new ALCOR MONKEY INTERNALS be?

> 
> What could these brand new ALCOR MONKEY INTERNALS be?

Alexustas just updated the ALCOR pod, so there are new shiny things inside to further polish off his masterpiece. The monkey rover internals came from the ALCOR

Thanks MeCripp and Yanfret
What about making ORION the fancy new MK1-2 replacement IVA? By the guy who made ALCOR?

> 
> What about making ORION the fancy new MK1-2 replacement IVA? By the guy who made ALCOR?

I agree, I mean that IVA is the best!

\* Ding

**Update: 1.0.4 B**

( ALCOR Mk1-2 Pod IVA for Orion and updated ALCOR Monkey Internals for Rover and other pods )

One reason we had to wait for this was Alex was working on an updated enlarged monkey version of the ASET IVA for us and we needed to have both on the same page in terms of props and requirements. It became ready this morning so ALCOR Mk1-2 comes with.

See first page for links!

![qEt4jZ.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img537/3498/qEt4jZ.jpg)

YAY! Someone actually took one of my ideas seriously!

....or it is just that great minds think alike. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
is it compatible with the IVA for the stock pod?

Sure just change the internal name in the cfg

But if we're talking about the IVA on it's own I need to get you on Alex's page for exact info [https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/1022/%27MK1-2%20%20Pod%27%20IVA%20Replacement%20by%20ASET](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/1022/%27MK1-2%20%20Pod%27%20IVA%20Replacement%20by%20ASET)
I've downloaded it separately before getting this new version, I'll test it right now

> 
> is it compatible with the IVA for the stock pod?

You could use the patch just a page back may save you alittle if thats what you are looking for [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124388-Chaka-Monkey-Exploration-Systems-1-0-4-B?p=2095970&viewfull=1#post2095970](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124388-Chaka-Monkey-Exploration-Systems-1-0-4-B?p=2095970&viewfull=1#post2095970)

EDIT- Maybe a new Chaka Flag ? [https://www.bing.com/images/search?q=monkey+in+space&qpvt=monkey+in+space&qpvt=monkey+in+space&FORM=IGRE](https://www.bing.com/images/search?q=monkey+in+space&qpvt=monkey+in+space&qpvt=monkey+in+space&FORM=IGRE)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-23T03:12:10Z" title="07/23/2015 03:12  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 23, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**

> 
> I've downloaded it separately before getting this new version, I'll test it right now

Okay, the ALCOR folder MK1-2 files included in this update are identical. Chaka's ALCOR folder *also* contains the Alcor Monkey Internal files but that's the only difference

seems to be working fine except for a glitch that seems to come from the ALCOR interior, where the opposite forward window blinks continuously (could also be my video settings), other than that, no problems. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I've updated CMES and then installed the ALCOR Mk-1-2 IVA btw
Are there any plans to migrate to CKAN?

> 
> Are there any plans to migrate to CKAN?

There are, eventually. Yanfret said so a page or two ago.

One issue I can foresee with Chaka + CKAN is that for one part only we are dependent on an old and unsupported version of Fustek's DLL, and I cant figure out how to script that to CKAN without creating a mess

> 
> One issue I can foresee with Chaka + CKAN is that for one part only we are dependent on an old and unsupported version of Fustek's DLL, and I cant figure out how to script that to CKAN without creating a mess

Is there any foreseeable workaround? I have absolutely nothing to offer except moral support lol I'm just really interested

> 
> One issue I can foresee with Chaka + CKAN is that for one part only we are dependent on an old and unsupported version of Fustek's DLL, and I cant figure out how to script that to CKAN without creating a mess

> 
> Is there any foreseeable workaround? I have absolutely nothing to offer except moral support lol I'm just really interested

FusTek maintainer here.

I see what's going on - the DLL in question is **FusTek\_Sumghai.DLL**, which is simply an (authorized) repackaging of the Firespitter.DLL animation modules. You're using it on a modified version of my Kupola, for the blast shutter animations.

You can get rid of my DLL and safely replace it with the stock KSP animation PartModule (which is what I'll be using in my V1.0 update to the official FusTek Kupola anyway)

    MODULE{	name = ModuleAnimateGeneric	animationName = KupolaBlastShutters	startEventGUIName = Close Blast Shutters 	endEventGUIName = Open Blast Shutters	actionGUIName = Toggle Blast Shutters}

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-24T05:12:21Z" title="07/24/2015 05:12  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 24, 2015</time> by sumghai**
Thank you **Very Much!**
sumghai to the rescue!
I'll give myself a little pat on the back for facilitating this little get together ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
